Game.Name: 2 Games in 1 - Scooby-Doo + Scooby-Doo 2 - Monsters Unleashed (USA)
Game.plot: 2 Games in 1 Double Pack: Scooby-Doo / Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Various and published by THQ,which was released in 2006.Cheat: Enter the following codes as passwords.Cheat: After you beat the game, you will be asked for a code (you had to see the movie for the code)Cheat: On the main screen, go down to "password" option.Cheat: Enter this code at the Password ScreenCheat: Enter these codes in the Password screen.Cheat: The Credits can be found in the Option Menu, and the Mini Games Mode will appear in the Main Menu (in the place of the first Question Marks).
